about_the_game:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

Earn Training Points with Tsunade to get your hands on various Ninjutsu, weapons, and costumes, allowing you to create a ninja unique to you!

Content includes:
• Two Ninjutsu:
Heavenly Foot of Pain (Heal Type)
Nervous System Rupture (Heal Type)
• A Secret Technique:
Slug: Long-Distance Healing (Heal Type)
• A Weapon:
1 Sho Bottle (Heal Type)
• An Avatar Part:
Tsunade's Hair (female only)
• Costumes:
Tsunade Outfit: Top/Bottom (female only)
Tsunade's Ninja Way T-Shirt
detailed_description:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

Earn Training Points with Tsunade to get your hands on various Ninjutsu, weapons, and costumes, allowing you to create a ninja unique to you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: A special pack for avatar ninja! Special Ninjutsu Training: Round 7 features the Fifth Hokage Tsunade! Purchase the DLC to be able to train under her via the Ninjutsu Library!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
